thread.title: Anaqua Expands Services Suite for All Phases of the IP Lifecycle
thread.title_full: Anaqua Expands Services Suite for All Phases of the IP Lifecycle - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Anaqua Expands Services Suite for All Phases of the IP Lifecycle
text:
Adding to annuities, renewals, and title updates, Anaqua introduces new services for paralegal support, strategic research, and patent drafting.
Boston, MA (PRWEB) September 24, 2015
Anaqua, a worldwide leading provider of intellectual property (IP) management software and services – today announced the expansion of its services suite, which previously included annuities, title updates, and trademark renewals. Building on this foundation, Anaqua now provides flexible, on-demand services for patent drafting, strategic research—including patentability, landscaping, and freedom-to-operate searches—as well as paralegal support, such as docketing and data verification.
The ANAQUA Services Suite seamlessly integrates with Anaqua’s Unified IP Management platform. As a result, clients not only have fingertip access to these services, but they also receive the added benefit of having them performed by a team of experts with extensive experience and training in Anaqua’s best practices. The addition of these fully integrated, best-in-class services demonstrates Anaqua’s commitment to providing clients with the most comprehensive, user-friendly IP management solution on the market.
“IP departments today are forced to do more with less, and that means that they’re often overburdened with time-consuming tasks that take attention away from larger-scale responsibilities,” said Bob Romeo, CEO of Anaqua. “ANAQUA Services provides clients with a solution to this conundrum through a suite of integrated services along with a team of experts to help reduce the strain on internal resources. We’re excited to provide our users with yet another innovative add-on to our best-in-class IP management software solution.”
The ANAQUA Services Suite is immediately available to customers on a pay-per-project basis. For more information about Anaqua, please visit http://www.anaqua.com .
About Anaqua
Anaqua helps corporations and law firms turn intellectual property into competitive advantage. Our software platform, ANAQUA, unifies the critical tools, best practice workflows, data, documents, and services into one efficient, intelligent environment, enabling our clients to make smarter and faster decisions. Nearly a million IP professionals in over 150 countries use ANAQUA to manage more than a billion dollars in intellectual assets. Many of the best known brands and most innovative products were conceptualized, evaluated, protected, and monetized through the ANAQUA platform. Anaqua is a privately-held company headquartered in Boston-US and has major European offices in London-UK and Pau-France as well as offices in other cities in North America, Asia, and Europe. The expertise of our ANAQUA Services & Client Services staff, combined with our tested implementation methodology, delivers successful solutions on time and on budget.
For additional information, please visit http://www.anaqua.com .
